channel.title: The Autobody Source Podcast
channel.itunes:author: The Autobody Source
channel.description:
The Autobody Source is your direct link to products, skills & training for a rewarding career in Automotive Collision Repair. We're all about mentorship so we've partnered with 40+ manufacturers and organizations across the industry to connect our growing audience with: The latest autobody products & services, Product know-how, best practices, trends & industry insights, Collision repair FAQs & solutions, and Industry events, activities & training.

 

For over three decades, The Autobody Source has connected repair solutions to collision shops across North America. In continuous publication since 1992, we differentiate ourselves with a publication that’s a direct resource for autobody products and brands to the warehouse, the jobber, and bodyshop technicians. We service over 17,000 jobber customers each year in the U.S. and Canada as well as Bermuda, Puerto Rico, Venezuela, Bahamas, and the Caribbean.

 

Visit https://autobodysource.com/ for more information.
channel.itunes:keywords: automotive, collision repair, career education, trade careers

item.itunes:title: Becoming a Detailing Pro at RUPES USA BigFoot Academy
item.title: Becoming a Detailing Pro at RUPES USA BigFoot Academy
item.itunes:summary: Send us a text Since 2017, vehicle detailers have leveled up their professional skills with hands-on training sessions at the RUPES USA BigFoot Academy near Denver, Colorado, where trainees get hands-on guidance in every part of the RUPES System and maximum one-on-one coaching from the RUPES expert technical team. Chris Wright, National Accounts Manager at RUPES USA, tells us how the company helps its students step into the future of surface correction. Thanks for listening! Follow us ...
item.description:
Send us a text

Since 2017, vehicle detailers have leveled up their professional skills with hands-on training sessions at the RUPES USA BigFoot Academy near Denver, Colorado, where trainees get hands-on guidance in every part of the RUPES System and maximum one-on-one coaching from the RUPES expert technical team. 

Chris Wright, National Accounts Manager at RUPES USA, tells us how the company helps its students step into the future of surface correction.

Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
item.content:encoded:
Send us a text

Since 2017, vehicle detailers have leveled up their professional skills with hands-on training sessions at the RUPES USA BigFoot Academy near Denver, Colorado, where trainees get hands-on guidance in every part of the RUPES System and maximum one-on-one coaching from the RUPES expert technical team. 

Chris Wright, National Accounts Manager at RUPES USA, tells us how the company helps its students step into the future of surface correction.

Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
item.itunes:author: The Autobody Source

item.itunes:title: The U.S. Auto Tech National Championship Driven by Yokohama
item.title: The U.S. Auto Tech National Championship Driven by Yokohama
item.itunes:summary: Send us a text For its 4th year in a row, the U.S. Auto Tech National Championship Driven by Yokohama spotlights the incredible skills of auto technician pros and students across the country, and elevates the awareness and importance of trade jobs around the world. This year's contestants are vying for a share of over $250,000 in cash PLUS an all-expense-paid trip to West Palm Beach, Florida, for a televised finale in September 2024. Trey Becker serves as the Vice President of B...
item.description:
Send us a text

For its 4th year in a row, the U.S. Auto Tech National Championship Driven by Yokohama spotlights the incredible skills of auto technician pros and students across the country, and elevates the awareness and importance of trade jobs around the world. 

This year's contestants are vying for a share of over $250,000 in cash PLUS an all-expense-paid trip to West Palm Beach, Florida, for a televised finale in September 2024. 

Trey Becker serves as the Vice President of Business Development at The University of Northwestern Ohio – a university known worldwide as a leader in the Automotive, Diesel, and High-Performance industries. Trey is also Technical Advisor to the U.S. Auto Tech National Championship Driven by Yokohama since it began in 2021, and he’s dedicated to bringing in and training the next generation of automotive technicians. ​

Here's Trey giving a rundown of the 2024 USATNC competition currently under way.

Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
item.content:encoded:
Send us a text

For its 4th year in a row, the U.S. Auto Tech National Championship Driven by Yokohama spotlights the incredible skills of auto technician pros and students across the country, and elevates the awareness and importance of trade jobs around the world. 

This year's contestants are vying for a share of over $250,000 in cash PLUS an all-expense-paid trip to West Palm Beach, Florida, for a televised finale in September 2024. 

Trey Becker serves as the Vice President of Business Development at The University of Northwestern Ohio – a university known worldwide as a leader in the Automotive, Diesel, and High-Performance industries. Trey is also Technical Advisor to the U.S. Auto Tech National Championship Driven by Yokohama since it began in 2021, and he’s dedicated to bringing in and training the next generation of automotive technicians. ​

Here's Trey giving a rundown of the 2024 USATNC competition currently under way.

Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
item.itunes:author: Trey Becker, Vice President of Business Development at The University of Northwestern Ohio

item.itunes:title: RBL's Expansion, Plus All-New Cordless Tools & Digitally Engineered Abrasives
item.title: RBL's Expansion, Plus All-New Cordless Tools & Digitally Engineered Abrasives
item.itunes:summary: Send us a text For over 30 years, RBL Products founder Ron Lipson has pioneered automotive paint masking systems, self-adhering films, pneumatic connectors, waxes and sealants, cordless tools, and more. This year, he chatted with us on his legacy, and the latest changes to his brand that launched at the end of 2023. Interested in RBL's new handheld cordless sander, 6" Cordless Orbital DA Polisher, or all-new GEOTek Digitally Engineered Abrasive? See your local jobber for pricing and availabi...
item.description:
Send us a text

For over 30 years, RBL Products founder Ron Lipson has pioneered automotive paint masking systems, self-adhering films, pneumatic connectors, waxes and sealants, cordless tools, and more. This year, he chatted with us on his legacy, and the latest changes to his brand that launched at the end of 2023.

Interested in RBL's new handheld cordless sander, 6" Cordless Orbital DA Polisher, or all-new GEOTek Digitally Engineered Abrasive? See your local jobber for pricing and availability.

Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
item.content:encoded:
Send us a text

For over 30 years, RBL Products founder Ron Lipson has pioneered automotive paint masking systems, self-adhering films, pneumatic connectors, waxes and sealants, cordless tools, and more. This year, he chatted with us on his legacy, and the latest changes to his brand that launched at the end of 2023.

Interested in RBL's new handheld cordless sander, 6" Cordless Orbital DA Polisher, or all-new GEOTek Digitally Engineered Abrasive? See your local jobber for pricing and availability.

Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
item.itunes:author: Ron Lipson, President, RBL Products

item.itunes:title: Exploring Collision Careers with I-CAR
item.title: Exploring Collision Careers with I-CAR
item.itunes:summary: Send us a text In July 2023, the CollisionCareers.com website and social channels officially launched with the goal of building a bridge between the growing field of collision repair and the skilled professionals who will shape its future. Dara Goroff, I-CAR Vice-President of Planning and Industry Talent Programming, discusses how schools, parents, educators & counselors can support students and career-changers to create qualified employees and connect them with rewarding care...
item.description:
Send us a text

In July 2023, the CollisionCareers.com website and social channels officially launched with the goal of  building a bridge between the growing field of collision repair and the skilled professionals who will shape its future.  Dara Goroff, I-CAR Vice-President of Planning and Industry Talent Programming, discusses how schools, parents, educators & counselors can support students and career-changers to create qualified employees and connect them with rewarding career opportunities.

Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
item.content:encoded:
Send us a text

In July 2023, the CollisionCareers.com website and social channels officially launched with the goal of  building a bridge between the growing field of collision repair and the skilled professionals who will shape its future.  Dara Goroff, I-CAR Vice-President of Planning and Industry Talent Programming, discusses how schools, parents, educators & counselors can support students and career-changers to create qualified employees and connect them with rewarding career opportunities.

Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
item.itunes:author: Dara Goroff, I-CAR Vice-President of Planning and Industry Talent Programming

item.itunes:title: Movers & Motivators: Sheik Adamsaib
item.title: Movers & Motivators: Sheik Adamsaib
item.itunes:summary: Send us a text This beloved autobody pro is arguably the refinish family’s biggest cheerleader! Sheik chats with us on how to encourage new comers into the trade, the benefits of building social media connections, gaining experience in the trade, and the new products and tools available to make our professional lives easier. Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.

item.itunes:summary: Send us a text Amy Kramer, North American Inside Sales Mananger with BASF Refinish & Annie Dovali, Automotive Collision Technology student at Metropolitan Community College in Omaha, discuss their career stories as females in a predominately male industry with the goal of intriguing young women into the Automotive world. item.itunes:title: Career Exploration with NASCAR Technical Institute
item.title: Career Exploration with NASCAR Technical Institute
item.itunes:summary: Send us a text More than just NASCAR: Universal Technical Institute's core vocational school programs prep students for automotive, welding, HVACR, robotics & automation, and CNC machining careers. We chatted with Rich Izer, Education Manager at NASCAR Technical Institute in Mooresville, SC — and active member of TechForce Foundation online network — on all things training, education, and mentorship. Rich also gave insight into how the next generation of technicians works, and what they a...
item.description:
Send us a text

More than just NASCAR: Universal Technical Institute's core vocational school programs prep students for automotive, welding, HVACR, robotics & automation, and CNC machining careers.

We chatted with Rich Izer, Education Manager at NASCAR Technical Institute in Mooresville, SC — and active member of TechForce Foundation online network — on all things training, education, and mentorship. Rich also gave insight into how the next generation of technicians works, and what they are looking for in their first shops.

For scholarships & grants for transportation technicians, visit https://techforce.org/

Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.

Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
item.content:encoded:
Send us a text

More than just NASCAR: Universal Technical Institute's core vocational school programs prep students for automotive, welding, HVACR, robotics & automation, and CNC machining careers.

Rich also gave insight into how the next generation of technicians works, and what they are looking for in their first shops.

For scholarships & grants for transportation technicians, visit https://techforce.org/

item.itunes:title: Movers & Motivators: D.J. White
item.title: Movers & Motivators: D.J. White
item.itunes:summary: Send us a text D.J. White, Regional Sales Manager, Automotive Aftermarket with Norton Abrasives, relates the inspirations he received throughout his career journey that charted his defining moments along the way. He also discusses the broad career opportunities available within in the Collision Repair industry and how his own career story can serve as a map. Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.

item.itunes:title: Career Exploration with TechForce Foundation
item.title: Career Exploration with TechForce Foundation
item.itunes:summary: Send us a text Ben Peoples with TechForce Foundation, a national nonprofit 501(c)(3), highlights its exciting efforts to drive the pipeline of future automotive technicians, support them through their education with scholarships, and connect them with hands-on careers, including industry-sponsored training and free resources for students, educators, techs, and employers. Visit https://techforce.org/ for more information. Thanks for listening! Follow us for more inspiring content on Facebook,...
